text.more:
Welcome to DataVisio ! Here, you can see your imported dataset file as a network graph!
A few things to remember are:
-Hover over your nodes to see who are it's neighbors
-Should you wish to know more about that node, select it to see it's details in full!
You may also select those node's neighbors to travel to them!
Have Fun!!
text.intro:
Here you can visualize your own selected dataset file!
Currently only accepts .JSON and .GEXF filetypes
text.title: DataVisio

legend.edgeLabel:
Relationships
These are the edges of the graph, that connect nodes to each other
legend.colorLabel:
Modularity
These are factors that differentiate nodes and edges in the graph
legend.nodeLabel:
Data Objects
These are the nodes of the graph
